title: Remove Step 3 proof link and keep the print flow sanitized

requirements.summary: Remove the hardcoded website link from the Step 3 print/PDF proof layout while keeping the on-screen Terms step and printing behavior intact.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/features/registration/steps/StepTermsAndConditions.tsx`, the print-only proof content no longer renders the hardcoded anchor link `http://star-maharashtra-galaxy-network`.
When using “Print / Save Proof”, the generated print/PDF content does not include `http://star-maharashtra-galaxy-network` anywhere in the document body.
The on-screen Step 3 Terms and Conditions UI remains functional and continues to allow printing after the user checks the agreement checkbox.

file_operations.description: Remove the print-only footer section that renders the hardcoded `http://star-maharashtra-galaxy-network` anchor so the proof returns to the prior link-free layout, without changing the on-screen Step 3 interaction and "Print / Save Proof" enablement behavior.

requirements.summary: Keep the Step 3 print flow sanitized so printed/PDF output never contains the deployment URL or caffeineAdminToken fragments, consistent with the pre-link-change behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The print flow continues to call `sanitizeUrlForPrint('caffeineAdminToken')` before opening the print dialog and during the print lifecycle.
The printed/PDF document body does not include the deployment URL (e.g., `https://decisive-scarlet-bm7-draft.caffeine.xyz`) or any `#caffeineAdminToken=...` fragment.

file_operations.description: Preserve and (if needed) strengthen the existing print lifecycle sanitization by ensuring `sanitizeUrlForPrint('caffeineAdminToken')` is invoked before `window.print()` and via `beforeprint`/`afterprint` listeners, so the browser print/PDF output does not leak the deployment URL or any `#caffeineAdminToken=...` fragments.
